thread.section_title: Mikes Dive Store Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of mikesdivestore.com
thread.title: Nicola Campbell
thread.title_full: Mikes Dive Store reviewed by Nicola Campbell

author: Nicola Campbell
title: Nicola Campbell
text: I had been very disorganised and left buying a new prescription mask to the very last minute. Although the mask I initially ordered wasn't available they offered me an alternative and posted it free of charge next day delivery to ensure I would receive it in time for my trip to the Maldives. They were fantastic and I would definitely buy from them again.
